duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and acknowledge all customers in a prompt and friendly manner.
Handle merchandise with care and provide information, assistance, and direction to customers.
Replenish product on shelves as required per Merchandising guidelines.
Stay knowledgeable of advertised sales, maintain pricing and signing.
Assist with restocking merchandise and keeping work area clean, neat, and well-stocked.
Assist customers in making buying decisions and promote programs such as CLUB Membership and In-Store Pick-up.

education_certification.credential: High School education or equivalent experience
